name: Ramen Maker!!
description:
Make ramen, comment Your highscore! Msg me if you want to make mods. Coded in pygame for My First Game Jam.

To Play:

     Just Point, click and sometimes drag items to make ramen

    experiment with different techniques to make different ramen and higher scores

Credit:

    Noah Biad (self): Game Design, Code, and audio

   Michael Bowen: Art, and Inspiration
